item.title: X-Men 3
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
I only have two things to say about X-Men 3:
1. Brett Ratner should be cast into the deepest darkest pits of the most horrible sticky place imagined.
2. Hey Marvel, how many pieces of silver did you get for selling your soul?
item.excerpt:encoded: I only have two things to say about X-Men 3: 1. Brett Ratner should be cast into the deepest darkest pits of the most horrible sticky place imagined. 2. Hey Marvel, how many pieces of silver did you get for selling your soul?
